seg.input:
Gratia et pax a domino.
Rogo te plurimum, Zuingli mi, ut paucis mihi mentem tuam adaperias atque edoceas, quid rei sit, quod Christum ad inferna descendisse confitemur. Sunt enim ex doctis hodie non pauci, qui mira hic comminiscuntur, interim ut nihilo minus ipsi sese torqueant et lectores avidos a se dimittant.
Vale.
Heilrych Bullingerus tuus.
Hulderycho Zuinglio, fratri in domino charissimo.
seg.output:
Grace and peace from the Lord.
I beg you most earnestly, my Zwingli, to open your mind to me and teach me what is the matter, that we confess Christ descended into hell. For there are today not a few learned men who indulge in strange musings, while at the same time they themselves wring their hands and dismiss eager readers.
Farewell.
Your Heilrych Bullingerus.
